_meta.title: MusicElo V3.0 — Song Metadata API Field Catalogue
_meta.description: Complete listing of song/track-level metadata fields from 10 sources: Spotify, YouTube Music (official+unofficial), Apple Music, MusicBrainz, Deezer, Last.fm, AcousticBrainz (legacy), Musixmatch, ReccoBeats, and local analysis (Essentia, librosa).
review_notes: (B1) Added speechiness and liveness to audio_features_availability_matrix — were present in report §5.1 but missing from JSON v0.1.
(B4) Version corrected from 2.0 to 0.2 — was out of sync with companion report.
(B5) Title aligned with companion report naming convention.

(D5) Original 4 services (Spotify, YouTube, Apple Music, MusicBrainz) still have no per-field listing in this JSON — only new_services_summary covers the 6 additions + local libs. Consider adding in a future revision if machine-readable field catalogue is needed for all 10 sources.
(D6) Added album.upc to Deezer key_fields — was referenced in report §4.2 but missing here.

deezer.unique_value: Free ISRC + BPM without authentication. ISRC lookup via /track/isrc:{ISRC}
deezer.access: No auth for catalogue lookups. OAuth for user data.

lastfm.unique_value: Best source for community genre/mood tags with weighted counts

acousticbrainz_legacy.unique_value: Pre-computed audio features for ~7M MusicBrainz recordings. CC0 licence.
acousticbrainz_legacy.access: No auth. Indexed by MusicBrainz Recording MBID. LEGACY: no new data since 2022. Website/API may be retired — data dumps on archive.org remain available.

musixmatch.unique_value: Largest licensed lyrics database (14M+). Structured genre data.
musixmatch.access: API key required. Free tier: 2000 calls/day, 30% lyrics. Commercial: paid.

reccobeats.unique_value: Free drop-in replacement for Spotify Audio Features. Uses Spotify track IDs.
reccobeats.access: Free, no auth. Rate limited (~0.5s between calls). Batch: ~5 IDs.

essentia_local.unique_value: Most comprehensive open-source MIR library. TensorFlow models for high-level features.
essentia_local.access: Local analysis. Requires audio files. AGPL v3 licence.

librosa_local.unique_value: Simple Python API. Building blocks for audio analysis. ISC licence.

artist_credit_matching.problem: MusicBrainz credits tracks to specific performing artist(s) per style guidelines, while streaming platforms credit the group for all tracks. Example: TWICE TEN album solo tracks credited to Nayeon/Jihyo on MB but TWICE on Spotify.
solution_strategy: 1. Store artist IDs from every platform, not just names
2. Use MusicBrainz release-level artist credit (album artist) for matching with streaming platforms
3. Use MusicBrainz 'member of group' artist relationships to resolve individual-to-group mapping
4. Fetch with inc=artist-credits for full credit details at release and track levels
5. Build artist alias/group membership cache for your library's groups

audio_features_availability_matrix._note: Shows where each audio feature type can be obtained now that Spotify has restricted access

apple_music.restriction: Catalogue songs only. Apple Developer Program required.

youtube_music.note: Not exposed via any public or unofficial API
